message.content:
cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.CL

The paper discusses recommendation and personalization systems, which are commonly used in information retrieval (IR) and human-computer interaction (HC) applications. Therefore, cs.IR and cs.HC are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also covers social networks (cs.SI) and information access (cs.SD), which are related to personalization. Finally, the paper discusses evaluation and privacy/trust, which are topics commonly studied in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL), respectively. Therefore, cs.CL is also a possible sub-category.
